item.title: Whoop 首席执行官表示考虑在未来两年内上市
item.description: 广受欢迎的无屏幕健身手环制造商 Whoop 公司正着眼于在未来两年内进行首次公开募股，并正在探索在其健康追踪平台上增加葡萄糖监测功能。【原文：Whoop Inc., the maker of popular screen-less fitness bands, is eyeing an initial public offering as soon as in the next two years and is exploring adding glucose monitoring to its health-tracking platform.】

item.title: 欧佩克第三季度石油市场观点因美国经济增长而转向顺差
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）对第三季度全球石油市场的预期从赤字转为盈余，原因是美国产量超出预期，而该组织本身也增加了供应。【原文：OPEC flipped estimates for global oil markets in the third quarter from a deficit to a surplus, as US production exceeded expectations while the group itself ramped up supplies.】

item.title: 国际能源机构对石油峰值不再那么肯定：能源日报
item.description: 能源监督机构称，全球石油消耗量有可能在本世纪中叶持续增长。【原文：The energy watchdog says it’s possible global oil consumption could keep increasing through the middle of the century.】

item.title: 花粉街希望 Markerstudy 以 30 亿英镑的估值进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Pollen Street Group Ltd. 已开始为英国保险公司 Markerstudy 的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Pollen Street Group Ltd. has begun preparing an initial public offering for UK insurer Markerstudy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丹格特称计划在津巴布韦投资多达 10 亿美元
item.description: 非洲首富阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）计划在津巴布韦投资多达 10 亿美元，建设水泥厂、发电厂和燃料管道。【原文：Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest person, plans to invest as much as $1 billion in Zimbabwe to build cement and power plants as well as a fuel pipeline.】

item.title: 南非中期预算更新中的赢家和输家
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）周三在开普敦向立法者提交了最新预算报告，介绍了改善后的宏观经济前景以及修订该国通胀目标的计划。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana delivered his budget update to lawmakers in Cape Town on Wednesday, presenting an improved macroeconomic outlook and plans to revise the country’s inflation target.】

item.title: 南非通过 3% 的通胀目标，债务高峰将至
item.description: 南非财政部长通过了 3% 的通胀目标，为游说改变这一目标的中央银行提供了政治支持。【原文：South Africa’s finance minister adopted a 3% inflation target, giving political backing to the central bank which lobbied for the change, while cautioning that debt will now peak at a slightly higher level.】

item.title: 国防科技大学吸引着追求 "使命胜于金钱 "的学生
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Janne Knodler 将访问斯坦福大学的国防科技会议，了解研究武器是否很酷。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Janne Knodler visits a defense tech conference at Stanford University to find out if it’s cool to work on weapons.】

item.title: 自主军用车辆初创公司在新交易中估值超过 10 亿美元
item.description:
摩尔战略风险投资公司（Moore Strategic Ventures）、富兰克林邓普顿公司（Franklin Templeton）等已向 Forterra 投资 2.38 亿美元。【原文：

Moore Strategic Ventures, Franklin Templeton and others have invested $238 million in Forterra.

】

item.title: 胡塞武装停火后，航运公司将对重返红海保持警惕
item.description: 经过近两年的红海船舶袭击事件后，顶级集装箱承运商的回流将是涓涓细流，而非蜂拥而至【原文：After nearly two years of ship attacks in the Red Sea, any return by the top container carriers will be more of a trickle than a stampede】

item.title: Milei 让比索不再推动阿根廷物价大幅上涨
item.description: 近年来，罗米娜-贾拉经历了阿根廷比索的五次贬值。今年是第六次。但与以往不同的是，作为一家批发超市的经理，贾拉和其他店主并不打算将成本上涨转嫁给顾客，至少不会立即这样做。"46 岁的他说："这一次，我们不会疯狂地急于涨价。【原文：Romina Jara has navigated five runs on the Argentine peso in recent years. This year brought the sixth. But unlike in the past, Jara — a manager in a wholesale supermarket — and other shopkeepers don’t plan on passing on the cost increase to customers, at least not immediately. “This time, we’re not going crazy and rushing to raise prices,” the 46-year-old said.】

item.title: Blythe Masters 领导的 FNZ 在一年内获得第二次现金注资
item.description: 数字财富管理平台 FNZ Group Ltd. 已从其机构股东处筹集到 6.5 亿美元的新股权融资，这是该公司今年从全球主要投资者处获得的第二笔现金注资。【原文：Digital wealth management platform FNZ Group Ltd. has raised $650 million in new equity funding from its institutional shareholders, its second cash injection from major global investors this year.】

item.title: 前以色列军队网络老大为云安全融资 7500 万美元
item.description: 由以色列军队前首席信息安全官创办的特拉维夫初创公司 Sweet Security 已获得 7500 万美元的新融资。【原文：Sweet Security, a Tel Aviv-based startup founded by the Israeli army’s former chief information security officer, has raised $75 million in new funding.】

item.title: 政策制定者管理 "转型"，中国信贷周期低速运转
item.description: 对世界第二大经济体来说，中国信贷增长失速既是好消息，也是坏消息。【原文：Credit growth at stall speed in China is both good and bad news for the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔认为价格风险 "略微 "向上方倾斜
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，随着经济发展势头强劲，各国政府开始在军事和基础设施方面投入巨资，欧元区的通胀风险偏向上行。【原文：Risks to inflation in the euro zone are skewed to the upside as the economy gathers momentum and governments start spending large sums on military and infrastructure, according to European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 这就是为什么你应该对股市反弹持怀疑态度
item.description: 美国股市似乎势不可挡，但投资者不应沾沾自喜，因为有许多迹象表明，这轮涨势比想象中更加脆弱。【原文：Stocks in the US seem unstoppable but investors shouldn’t be complacent because there are a number of markers suggesting the rally is more fragile than it seems.】

item.title: 英国在预算案前获得创纪录的通胀挂钩债券出价
item.description: 英国发行的通胀挂钩债券吸引了创纪录的订单，缓解了本月预算案出台前对债务可持续性的担忧。【原文：A UK offering of inflation-linked bonds has drawn record orders, easing debt sustainability concerns ahead of this month’s budget.】

item.title: 对冲基金巨头进军红火的私募市场
item.description: 史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）是金融界最富有的人之一，这要归功于他的交易员团队，他们在短期内按市价下注。但在过去的几周里，这位 Point72 资产管理公司的亿万富豪创始人让他的手下向投资者介绍了一种完全不同的策略—；在这种策略中，耐心而非速度带来了回报。【原文：Steve Cohen is one of the richest people in finance thanks to teams of traders making short-term mark-to-markets bets. But over the last few weeks, the billionaire founder of Point72 Asset Management has had his people out talking to investors about an entirely different strategy — where patience, not speed, delivers the payoff.】

item.title: 欧莱雅开始为 Kering Beauté 交易出售三部分欧元债券
item.description: 欧莱雅集团（L'Oréal SA）将出售至少 15 亿欧元（17 亿美元）的债券，交易分为三部分，以帮助其为收购 Kering Beauté 提供资金。【原文：L’Oréal SA is selling at least €1.5 billion ($1.7 billion) of bonds in a three-part deal to help finance its acquisition of Kering Beauté.】

item.title: 据说铅笔制造商 Fila 正在权衡收购 Doms 股份的各种方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利文具公司 Fila SpA 正在审查其持有的印度上市公司 Doms Industries Ltd 少数股权的选择方案，以寻求加深与快速增长的亚洲市场的联系。【原文：Italian stationery company Fila SpA is reviewing options for its minority stake in India-listed Doms Industries Ltd as it seeks to deepen ties with the fast-growing Asian market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 主权风险上升，企业债券成为新的避风港
item.description:
微软、空中客车、欧莱雅、西门子的借贷成本均高于其原籍国。【原文：

Microsoft, Airbus, L’Oreal, Siemens all borrow more cheaply than their countries of origin.

】

item.title: 高盛策略师认为未来十年美股将落后于所有同行
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）的策略师曾正确预测了华尔街今年的表现不佳，他预计美国股市在未来十年内将持续落后。【原文：The Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategist who correctly predicted Wall Street’s underperformance this year expects US equities to keep lagging for the next decade.】

item.title: 匈牙利收益率超过罗马尼亚，成为欧盟预算风险最高的国家
item.description: 匈牙利国债收益率一年来首次升至罗马尼亚国债收益率之上，成为欧盟国家中风险最高的国家，因为政府增加预算赤字的计划令市场感到震惊。【原文：Hungary’s government bond yields have risen above Romania’s for the first time in a year, becoming the riskiest in the European Union as government plans to boost the budget deficit jolted the market.】

item.title: 高市称日本央行政策对强劲经济非常重要
item.description: 日本首相高市真奈在其执政期间召开的重要经济小组首次会议上表示，货币政策对于建立强劲的经济和稳定的通货膨胀至关重要。【原文：Japan’s Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said that monetary policy is vital for establishing a strong economy and stable inflation, following the first meeting of a key economic panel during her administration.】

item.title: 投资者现在认为一些公司比政府更安全
item.description: 在 150 万亿美元的全球债券市场上，投资者逐渐得出结论：有些公司甚至比最强大的政府更安全。【原文：In the $150 trillion global bond market, investors are coming to the conclusion that some companies are safer bets than even the most powerful governments.】

item.title: 私营公司正被贷款人迅速接管
item.description: 私营公司正努力创造足够的现金来管理不断增加的负债，将管理职责移交给贷款人的数量至少是六年来最高的。【原文：Private companies are struggling to generate enough cash to manage mounting liabilities, handing management duties to their lenders in the highest numbers in at least six years.】

item.title: 不仅仅是经济承受能力，美国人对就业也很焦虑
item.description: 选民对经济承受能力的不满助长了民主党在上周州和地方选举中的获胜，除此之外，美国人对就业市场也开始感到不安。【原文：Voter frustration over affordability fueled Democratic wins in last week’s state and local elections, and on top of that, Americans are becoming uneasy about the job market too.】

item.title: 英国资产面临政治投机风云再起的风险
item.description: 分析师认为，英国最新的政治戏剧对该国资产不利，在有争议的预算案出台前，不确定性正在增加。【原文：The latest UK political drama is negative for the country’s assets, according to analysts, with uncertainties building ahead of a contentious budget.】

item.title: 食品成本下降，印度通胀率降至历史最低点
item.description: 受统计因素和食品价格大幅下降的影响，印度 10 月份的通货膨胀率降至历史最低水平。【原文：India’s inflation rate fell to its lowest level on record in October, driven by statistical factors and a sharp drop in food prices.】

item.title: 雪佛龙为首个人工智能数据中心电力项目选择了西得克萨斯州
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）选择德克萨斯州西部作为其首个为数据中心提供天然气电力的项目所在地，这是该石油巨头利用人工智能蓬勃发展的契机开展新业务的开端。【原文：Chevron Corp. chose West Texas as the site of its first project to provide natural gas-fired power to a data center, the beginning of a new line of business for the oil giant to capitalize on the boom in artificial intelligence.】
